0031273263.notes: 20+ sectors; tess-ebs period ~22.5 d & morph 0.081; SpT F5; deep eclipses of ~20% but no sectors have more than 1; period may be double tess-ebs; SAP - variability between eclipses; PDCSAP - discontinuities -> worse;
0031273263.exclude_reason: needs further investigation - may be able to get this to work by combining limited set of contiguous sectors

0032050581.notes: 11 sectors @ 120 s; tess-ebs period ~3.1 d morph 0.224; t0 may refer to secondary; shallow primary ~3% and secondary ~2%; likely too shallow for good fit but we could try; lots of instrumental effects in SAP resolved with PDCSAP; further investigation;

0038678931.notes: 14 sectors @ 120 s; tess-ebs period ~6.3 d morph 0.133; clear eclipses of ~10% and ~2%; lots of variability; will need flattening/detrending;

0052276229.notes: 2 sector @ 120 s (6 & 7); tess-ebs period ~2.5 d morph 0.243; eclipses of >20% but high level of noise (faint target); either negligible secondary or period is wrong; PDCSAP better than SAP;

0055524055.notes: 23 sector @ 120 s; tess-ebs period ~2.65 d morph 0.269; clear eclipses of ~15% & ~5%; highly variable between eclipses; SAP & PDCSAP similar;
0055524055.exclude_reason: short period and highly variable - investigate but probably low priorty

0077951245.notes: 3 sectors @ 120 s (5, 6 & 32); tess-ebs period ~10.7 d morph 0.075; clear eclipses of ~7%; either negligible secondary or period is wrong; variability between eclipses; SAP & PDCSAP similar;

0078055054.notes: 3 sectors @ 120 s (5, 6 & 32); tess-ebs period ~4.4 d morph 0.241; clear eclipses of ~4% & significant noise; either negligible secondary or period is wrong; PDCSAP fixes instrumental effects in SAP

0080025900.notes: 3 sectors @ 120 s (8, 61 & 62); tess-ebs period ~4.1 d morph 0.302; clear eclipses of ~7% and 3% with secondary near phase 0.42; clipping distorted section in S8; some variability; ephemeris shifted between S8 and 61/62; PDCSAP improves on instrumental effects in SAP; only 2 unique SED points for fit;

0092743594.notes: 4 sectors @ 120 s (8/9, 61 & 63); tess-ebs period ~4.2 d morph 0.307; SpT G2/5(III)+A; not in Gaia DR3 - parallax from RAVE; clear eclipses of ~2% and <1% (phiS ~0.44); low noise but some variability between eclipses; PDCSAP fixes instrumental effects in SAP;

0117739806.notes: 2 sectors @ 120 s (6 & 7); tess-ebs period ~5.6 d morph 0.224; SpT A5; clear & deep primary of ~20% and shallow secondary of ~2%; significant variability, especially S7 - will need flattening; SAP & PDCSAP similar;
0117739806.exclude_reason: shallow secondary and variability - investigate further

0130876312.notes: 2 sectors @ 120 s (7 & 8); tess-ebs period ~7.9 d morph 0.397; eclipses of ~8% & ~3%; variability between eclipses - may require flattening; distorted section in S8 (clipped); PDCSAP improves on SAP;

0134522557.notes: 8 sectors @ 120 s (7/8, 34/35, 61/62 & 88/89); tess-ebs period ~5.7 d morph 0.294; SpT B1V; eclipses of ~5% and ~1% with extensive pulsations; will require flattening to fit; PDCSAP improves on SAP;
0134522557.exclude_reason: shallow eclipses and extensive pulsations - further investigation

0140659978.notes: 29 sectors @ 120 s (5 ... 90); tess-ebs period ~9.4 d morph 0.090; bright star nearby -> possible l3; clear eclipses of ~35% and ~20%; pulsations visible; may need flattening; PDCSAP resolves many (not all) instrumental distortions;
0140659978.exclude_reason: lots of intervention required - investigate further

0140659980.notes: 25 sectors @ 120 s; tess-ebs period ~9.4 d morph 0.085; SpT F5V; nearby star potential source of l3; clear eclipses of ~6% and ~3%; significant pulsations (gamma-Dor?); will require flattening to fit; PDCSAP improves on SAP;
0140659980.exclude_reason: significant pulsation - flattening required - further investigation

0001220444.notes: 1 sector (5); tess-ebs period 7.162 d morph 0.173; SpT G0; prim eclipse depths of ~4% & very shallow secondary ~0.5%; SAP - lots of variability between eclipses; PDCSAP & SAP much the same;

0001449640.notes: 2 sectors (5 & 32); tess-ebs period 3.5 d; prim eclipse depths of ~2%; either negligible secondary eclipse or period is wrong; SAP - instrumental effects skew s32; PDCSAP - fixes skew -> better

0013957444.notes: 2 sectors @ 120 s (5 & 32); tess-ebs period ~3.74 d & morph 0.257; SpT F6V; clear eclipses - primary ~8% & secondary ~1.5%; secondary shallower than ideal but quick-fit indicates may be usable;

0014081980.notes: 2 sectors @ 120 s (5 & 6); tess-ebs period ~2.92 d & morph 0.326; shallow eclipses - primary ~1.5% & secondary ~0.5%; PDCSAP flux flattens variability seen in SAP;
